message: The door opens and we leave the elevator.
The exit isn't far now.
A thunderous boom shakes the tower. The floor bucks beneath my feet, and cracks open up in the wall right next to us.
It's coming down!
I cover my head with my arms, but the weight of falling debris knocks me to the floor.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Hgh, gah, Noiz...!"
Coughing, the air thick with dust and dirt, I try to push the rubble off me.
...That's when I feel something soft touch my head.
I reach up with my hand, wondering what it is.
No...<K> No, it can't be...
Noiz is crouched over me, shielding me from the debris.
After a moment, his strength gives out. He collapses atop me with a groan.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! You okay?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "...Fuck that hurts... You okay...?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Never mind me! What about you?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Haha... Can't really... tell where it hurts."
Noiz slips off me to the side. His back and hair are covered with dust, and his clothes are ripped and torn.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey... You sure you're okay? Can you even move?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Fuck if I know... I think... something's broken."
Noiz holds up a trembling arm.
His wrist dangles from the end, bent at an unnatural angle. It almost looks like he's doing it on purpose.
An injury like that would be pretty fucking painful for a normal person. For Noiz, who's only just started to feel pain, it must be excruciating.

name: ノイズ
message: "Ouch..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Okay! Don't try to move! Fuck, we have to get out of here..."
The tower shakes again.
We've gotta get outta here now!

name: ノイズ
message: "...Just go."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No fucking way, dumbass!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Haha... You literally just said the same thing... Besides, I really can't move..."
The burn on my side still hurts, but that's nothing compared to what Noiz must be going through.
My injuries from the rubble are all just scratches. My headache is mostly gone too, so I can move just fine.
...Alright.

name: 蒼葉
message: "This might hurt a little."

name: ノイズ
message: "Huh?! What are you... Hey!"
I slip my arms under Noiz's knees and shoulders and gently lift him up.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Up you go...!"

name: ノイズ
message: "What're you doing?! Put me down!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "No."
Though skinny, Noiz is still a grown man. He's not exactly light.
But it doesn't bother me. I don't let it.
We need to get the hell out of here.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Okay... Let's go! Hold on tight!"
With Noiz in my arms, I run with all my might. Around us, the shaking grows to a terrifying roar.
I leap to avoid the crumbling walls, and fight to keep from stumbling against the buckling floor.
The entrance is just in front of us.
Almost... there!

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's wrong? Does it hurt? We're almost out..."

name: ノイズ
message: "Nah... Haha!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why are you laughing?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "It's just... so fucking stupid."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm working my ass off here!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Sorry. ...And thanks."
A burst of energy surges through my limbs. I let it carry me toward the entrance.
We're just steps away when a light falls from the ceiling.
I dodge it, barely, but it blocks our path.
I shoulder past it. The exit... is there.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Urrryahhhhhhhh!!!"
The door looks as though it might collapse at any moment, but I dash through to the outside.
My momentum keeps me running for a bit, but as soon as I feel that we're safe, I crumple to my knees.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Haa, haa, haa, haa.."
I set Noiz gently down on the ground, then fall onto my back.
My lungs feel like they're going to explode. Every breath starts a new coughing fit.
Moments after we escape the tower, it collapses with a noise like the end of the world.
Screams rise from the crowd that has assembled near the base.
It's... really over.
The two of us lie there, staring in shock at the tower as it falls.
